body: I'll be honest, I'm not a fan of these kinds of stories, but having a great opportunity to tell a painful story that makes your hair stand on end with rage or emotion according to each one with a scene that had everything for that, you just created such a basic doujinshi and with dialogues so ridiculous that they mention the obvious, that don't go anywhere, despite knowing how to draw the story is too basic, empty and ridiculous with situations that don't make sense like the yami that don't even know when they got there, the only thing the drawing is good but from there everything is terrible
Shit man, I thought with the new season we could possibly get decent Kurumi doujins but nah we just get a repost and nothing more
Aw hell nah, just a repost. I thought it was something big. but I mean, tohka's badonkers are big, but still.....
